addr: 405 W 55th St. 5th Floor, Studio 5B. New York, NY 10019
title: Broadway Barkada: "LUMIPAD" Dance Concert 2015
desc: Broadway Barkada cordially invites you to "LUMIPAD" A Pinoy Night of Dance. This is our 4th production of the "Take Flight" Initiative.? We are bringing together the NY Filipino dance community -- artists who are currently starring on Broadway, and Off-Broadway. ?We will be presenting a night full of various dance styles: modern, lyrical, jazz, cultural and many other styles. ? Sunday, November 29, 2015 DOORS OPEN 7:30PM (Cocktail Hour) SHOW starts 8PM ? Tickets:? $ 40 General Admission/ $75 VIP Admission + Open Wine Bar At the Door: $40 General Admission / $80 VIP + Open Wine Bar ? Location: Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater/ In the Ailey Studios  The Joan Weill Center for Dance  405 W. 55th Street (at 9th Avenue) - 5th Floor, Studio 5B PLEASE NOTE:? Seating is limited.? First Come first serve.
